At The Economist, we’re prioritising the health and well-being of our staff. For more information, please see our regularly updated FAQs for COVID-19 in settings, FAQ

We have brought back Espresso’s markets and currencies page. It features the latest values of seven leading stockmarket indices from around the world, prices for Brent crude oil and for gold, and exchange rates for the most important global currencies. You can also customise the currency pairs.
This page was removed last year because of problems with the data. These have been resolved. We hope you enjoy your improved app.
